name: parka

a warm, often waterproof, jacket or coat with a hood (= part for covering the head), often one with fur around it
stocksnapper/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
US (UK anorak) a jacket that protects the wearer against wind, rain, and cold weather, usually with a hood (= part for covering the head)
domin_domin/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
